title: Bug 49536: Accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps deployed
OB: When a Tomcat 7 instance is started with no webapps deployed and a URL is accessed, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK response with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
EB: When a Tomcat 7 instance is started with no webapps deployed and a URL is accessed, the server should return an HTTP error 404 response indicating the requested resource was not found.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 instance from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps
3. Access a URL on the server
4. Observe the server response, it should return an HTTP error 404.
